articles.content: Gonzaga forward and Minneapolis native Chet Holmgren didn't wait long to hear his name called on Thursday night as the Oklahoma City Thunder selected him with the second overall pick in the 2022 NBA … [+675 chars]

articles.title: White Sox Place Danny Mendick On Injured List With Torn ACL, Select Lenyn Sosa - MLB Trade Rumors
articles.description: The White Sox have placed infielder Danny Mendick on the 10-day injured list with a torn ACL, the team announced. …
articles.content: The White Sox have placed infielder Danny Mendick on the 10-day injured list with a torn ACL, the team announced. Infielder Lenyn Sosa will have his contract selected from Double-A as he joins the ac… [+2400 chars]
